name: Virgin Wavy
description:
PHONE ORDERS:
347-915-4247
Monday-Saturday 9:00am-8:00pm

Email: virginbeautyhair@gmail.com

The naturally full body of wavy Indian hair makes this hair texture the most versatile of all.  It can be worn  curly by using a curling iron, or straight when flat ironed. An alternate option would be to air dry the hair and apply styling mousse or gel in order to create a “bed head” style. This texture is truly versatile and the most popular.

We offer 100% unprocessed virgin remy Indian Hair. We never process or color our hair and we guarantee our hair to be 100% virgin. This makes our hair unmatched in quality.

Weight: Approximately 4oz each bundle
Color: Naturally Off Black to Dark Brown
Weft: Machine Weft
Styling: 2 to 3 bundles needed for full weave depending on the length of hair and volume desired

All sales are final, due to the nature of this product.

name: Virgin Straight
description:
PHONE ORDERS:
347-915-4247
Monday-Saturday 9:00am-8:00pm

Email: virginbeautyhair@gmail.com

Straight hair is beautiful and chic. If you like to style your hair straight most of the time and enjoy having light gentle waves once in a while, our Naturally Straight virgin Indian hair is your right choice. Naturally straight Indian hair typically has a slight wavy pattern (see photo*), but can be flat ironed quickly for an ultra sleek straight look. When the hair is washed and air dried, it regains its natural gentle wave.

We offer  100% unprocessed virgin remy Indian Hair. We never process or color our hair and we guarantee our hair to be 100% virgin. This makes our hair unmatched in quality.

Weight: Approximately 3 to 4 oz each bundle
Color: Naturally Off Black to Dark Brown
Weft: Machine Weft
Styling: 2 to 3 bundles needed for full weave depending on the length of hair and volume desired

All sales are final, due to the nature of this product.

name: Virgin Kinky Curly
description:
PHONE ORDERS:
347-915-4247
Monday-Saturday 9:00am-8:00pm

Email: virginbeautyhair@gmail.com

The Kinky Curly Virgin Indian Remy hair weave extension is a super luxurious texture of tight natural curls. The kinky curly texture is the ideal curl pattern for individuals looking for a tighter textured natural curls which can easily blend with existing hair. Despite it's ultra tight curls, the kinky curly texture can still be flat ironed straight. It will return to its kinky curly texture after wetting or washing. As it is made of 100% Virgin Indian Remy human hair, it can be cut, colored, straightened, and recurled. Everything that you do with your own hair can be done with these sew in weave extensions.
We offer  100% unprocessed virgin remy Indian Hair. We never process or color our hair and we guarantee our hair to be 100% virgin. This makes our hair unmatched in quality.

Weight: Approximately 4oz each bundle
Color: Naturally Off Black to Dark Brown
Weft: Machine Weft
Styling: 2 to 3 bundles needed for full weave depending on the length of hair and volume desired

All sales are final, due to the nature of this product.
